title: Bug 17423: Revert appears twice in the popup menu
description: There are two Revert options in the menu.
OB: In the popup menu, there are two instances of the 'Revert' option.
EB: There should be only one 'Revert' option, and it should be disabled as expected.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1) Open a Java editor. 
2) Make the editor dirty. 
3) Popup the menu. The issue occurs with one 'Revert' option appearing after 'UNDO' and another before 'FORMAT'.
